attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Separate national hard line network to carry network services to vital infrastructure nationwide with the additional ability to localise and detect any localised intrusions and be able to cut the hard line, plus EMP resistance.  The purpose, why have our nations core IT infrastructure open to over seas cyber attack threats?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
